description: A turbo hatchback with rally DNA in every weld. The Night Runner came from the factory with a turbo four and optional all-wheel drive, making it a weapon in any conditions. Wet roads, gravel shoulders, broken pavement â€” the Night Runner doesn't care.
lore: Eclipse built the Night Runner to homologate their rally program, and it shows. The turbo spools hard at 3,500 RPM and the AWD system claws for traction like a caged animal. Half the street racers in Nova Pacifica learned to drive fast in one of these.
